name: Harpreet Singh
bio: Hello! I’m Harpreet Singh. I am passionate about Full Stack Development with 6+ years of focused experience in PHP/Vue/ReactJs applications with expertise in reviewing client requirement prioritizes requirements and baseline project plan. I am a skilled Full stack developer and master of popular PHP frameworks Laravel. I am a quick learner and a team worker that gets the job done.

workExperience.company: Tech Prastish Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
workExperience.jobDescription:
• Collaborate with web design and development team to create a new website for a tech startup, assisting with coding.
  • Delegate objectives to team of coders to facilitate time frame and meet the common vision of the project.
  • Assist design team with coding to create a user-friendly interface that is compatible across every major operating system.
  • Manage user feedback and perform system checkups to ensure the functionality of the website.
  • Oversee team of one junior coder and two interns.

• Wrote server-side and client-side code using PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
  • Developed back-end components to connect applications with web services.
  • Designed user-facing elements to integrate with web APIs and server-side logic.
  • Performed troubleshooting of technical issues within production environment.
  • Regularly updated knowledge of latest industry trends in web development and related technologies.

projects.name: Jonusta
projects.description: It’s an international development work marketplace where freelancers can get paid by clients & clients can find talent and the skills to take their projects forward and consistently deliver high quality work.
projects.skills: Laravel, MySQL, VueJs, HTML, CSS, Stripe
projects.responsibilities:
• To Develop/Design as per requirement.
  • Requirement gathering and analysis.
  • Knowledge sharing with the team and new members.
  • Bug fixes.
